headline.main: SEAMEN TELL OF LOSS OF WARSHIP HAMMANN; Destroyer Was Sunk by Torpedoes Headed for Yorktown

lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Aug. 1 (AP) -- Two young survivors of the destroyer Hammann told today how their warship was sunk in the Battle of Midway by Japanese torpedoes headed for the United States aircraft carrier Yorktown.
abstract: 2 survivors of US destroyer Hammann, sunk in Midway Is battle, discuss ship loss
snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, Aug. 1 (AP) -- Two young survivors of the destroyer Hammann told today how their warship was sunk in the Battle of Midway by Japanese torpedoes headed for the United States aircraft carrier Yorktown....
